import React, {Component} from 'react'; import tether from '../tether.png' class Main extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props.stakingBalance) return(
Staking Balance Reward Balance
{window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.stakingBalance, 'Ether')} USDT {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.rwdBalance, 'Ether')} RWD
{ event.preventDefault() let amount amount = this.input.value.toString() amount = window.web3.utils.toWei(amount, 'Ether') this.props.stakeTokens(amount) }} >
Balance: {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.tetherBalance, 'Ether')}
{this.input = input}} type='text' placeholder='0' required />
    USDT
AIRDROP
) } } export default Main;
